modName: Unique Party and Radiant Clothes - Textures by Phil
summary: Adds textures to make the party clothes and the clothes of the radiant raiment shop in Solitude more unique.
descriptionHtml:
Unique Party and Radiant Clothes
--------------------------------

Author
------
PhilSchmidheiny with the help of Elandra

This mod adds textures to make the party clothes and the clothes of the radiant raiment shop in Solitude more unique.

Do whatever you like with the texture but please credit me.

Content
-------

Unique textures for the following:

-Radiant Raiment Clothes
-Party Clothes

both female and male versions of the clothing are included.

Texture size
------------

4k

All textures have the same size as the Bethesda HiRes TexturePack.

Thanks
-------

Special thanks to Elandra for the idea and support!
author: PhilSchmidheiny
